website_summaries.verdict: This pocket watch earns compliments for its accuracy, hefty feel, and smart looks, but it also has some quirks that are potentially frustrating.
pros: A basic model with a classic design: open face, gunmetal finish, and smooth back that's ideal for engraving a personalized message
cons: The chain and the clip that come with it feel poorly made compared to the watch
Requires a battery, which is very difficult to change because the watch back is hard to open

customer_reviews.title: Time Scale
customer_reviews.text: The pocket watch offered appears to be larger on Amazon, than it is in reality. It is half the size of what I was expecting; but that may also be the result of my own experience. I own an antique railroad pocket watch, and I had never seen anything smaller. As it turns out, I like the smaller size. It is easier to carry around in my pants pocket. Finally, the watch comes with its own chain. When I ordered this watch, Amazon immediately offered me a new chain, which I also ordered. It was slightly nicer than the original chain; but was completely unnecessary. Overall, I am pleased with both this pocket watch, and the additional chain I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for this price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Tag Heuer owner who wanted a watch for the outdoors, camping, beach, etc. when I don't want to wear an expensive watch. The build quality on this Gotham is nothing more and nothing less that what you'd expect at under $100. Pleased. What gets the 5 stars is that this watch survived a drop into about 8 inches of water. Complete submersion for several seconds. 48 hours later going strong, no fogging, no condensation, no signs of interior dampness at all. It's not advertised as water proof, and I'm not suggesting you try my accidental test, but I'm pleased with how tightly constructed this watch is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A genuine timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people who cannot wear wrist watches and during my 37 year work career was not allowed to wear wrist watches on the work floor so instead I have always carried a pocket watch. A cheaper watch from a big box store lasted about a month so I wanted to spend a little more money for a better and more reliable watch which the Gotham Watch will provide. The face is easy to read, the watch is slender and if feels comfortable in my pocket. It carries a lifetime warranty. I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Basic pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Your basic pocket watch - a bit on the small size, but for the price seems pretty solid. Easy to read, fits in small pocket in jeans (yes, that is what the pocket is for)... Decent chain as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: For those wanting a pocket watch, as opposed to a wrist watch, this is a good choice. The photo does not show the attractive chain that is supplied with the watch. The chain has a clip/clasp on the other end that is, unfortunately, entirely closed. One must open it a bit, say with a coin, for it to be usable. What I did was to attach a small caribiner clip to the clasp making it more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Birdsall

customer_reviews.title: Nice pocket Watch - keeps great time
customer_reviews.text: Keeps great time. I learned a tip regarding these quartz movement watches. If you have to set them very much as when they first arrive or when daylight savings time changes, advance the time one hour past what you want, depress the stem and let them tick of a few seconds, then pull the stem and back them up to the time you want. Otherwise when you set them, they assume that they are keeping poor time and self-adjust their rate.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect, the finish looks great, the white face is easy to read, it keeps accurate time and looks classy doing it. I wear it everyday at work in a hardware store and it's held up great, unlike my last wristwatch that lasted 2days.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I carry this watch at work since I'm not allowed to bring a phone in. Extremely easy to read even in harsh environments. Keeps time very well even over a whole year.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a pocket watch that I purchased at another website and promptly fell apart. The first watch came with a nice braided leather cord and leather pocket. I decided to keep the pocket and cord from the first (crappy) watch, and replace the actual watch with something more durable. I chose this as it had an easy to read face and was the correct size. The watch looks and works great and has been quite durable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James Mctamaney

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional Company!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the watch, chain, and packaging. Gotham Watch Company offers the professionalism I've been looking for. Will do more business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for with modern conveniences (thin)
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Webb

customer_reviews.title: Quality, nice looking and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I have very happy with this quality pocket watch. I use it in the summer when I wear shorts. Looks nice and easy to read. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: So impressed I will be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.text: So impressed I will be buying a few more. Great watch! PERFECT size for a pocket watch!!! Was looking for a small \ thin watch. This is it. Great build, keeps great time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, clean design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, clean design, a little smaller than I thought it would be. Unfortunately, it was in the watch pocket of a pair of jeans that went into the washer when it was less than two weeks old. I'm debating whether to replace it---I do love the clean lines of the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: IrishBill

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a watch that would fit easily in my pocket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a watch that would fit easily in my pocket. When I swing dance I don't want a wristwatch to snag my partner. The Gotham Men's Railroad Open pocket watch is thin and light, unnoticeable in your pocket. The face is bright and easy to read. I love this watch so much I bought another one for my dance teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but excellent things to say about the watch and Amazon's customer service. This is a very handsome watch with a watch chain. It is even prettier that the picture shows. The gun metal finish is great and the dial is clear and very legible. This watch keeps perfect time to within the second. It was bought as a gift and the recipient is thrilled with it. I will be purchasing from Gotham and Amazon in the future. Thank you for your service.
customer_reviews.author: becky buckley

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the Pocket Watch as well as the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Pocket Watch as well as the whole buying process with the Gotham Watch Company. The watch arrived within the scheduled delivery date and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for slipping into the pocket. The face is large, there is a second hand, and also shows military time. The chain has a very sturdy grip so there is no concern for the watch breaking away. It's a wonderful piece, very smooth, and feels good even to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: but for now I like the esthetics
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a short period of time so not sure how it will hold up, but for now I like the esthetics, the size, weight and the price. I like to wear it with jeans when I don't want to wear a wrist watch. Reminds me of the past.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin watch
customer_reviews.text: I kept breaking wristwatches at work so I decided to go for a pocketwatch. I chose this one because it's not big and bulky but small and thin and fits nicely in my change pocket of my jeans. It's easy to read at a glance and the chain clips on my belt so it can't get away from me. If you're a machine operator this would be a good choice over a wristwatch that can get snagged or broken.
customer_reviews.author: hup234

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to read, a good size, and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to read, a good size, and accurate. this is a nice small watch I use for every day. the chain is a nice length but I don't like the belt clip.
customer_reviews.author: Jackk

customer_reviews.title: Watch yes - Chain, not so much
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. Keeps perfect time, fits nicely in my hand, very clear face. The chain is not in keeping with quality of watch. Cheap. Broke right out of the box. My suggestion to Gotham is to forget the chain. It only detracts from a very nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: GRL3

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - easy to read (large numbers on simple white background
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted - easy to read (large numbers on simple white background, uncluttered) - easy to set (just pull the stem, turn) - and with a knife on the other end of the chain the watch tucks behind my waist band and is easy to get to - and leaves my wrist uncluttered.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a week, so this is not a review from a long term owner. So far, it is exactly what I expected. The face is easy to read. It keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I used the watch only a dozen times then the clear plastic face ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the watch only a dozen times then the clear plastic face broke off and the watch hands became mangled. This was with very normal wear and tear only. i would strongly recommend against buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Delivered as promised. Watch was set to the right time when I opened the box and runs perfect, nicely packaged also, Ready to be presented as a gift, with a nice soft carry bag. Chain is of good quality too. Only thing I would suggest is the size could be a bit larger but as is it is a nice pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my dad & he really likes it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best gift I have ever gotten my 94 year old grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Skis11

customer_reviews.title: light and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected....light and easy to read. Time will tell how durable it is - but I'm totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, accurate, throwback piece. Perfect for the someone who prefers analog, but not on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this watch. He was always breaking his wrist watch by snagging it on store boxes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: Good small watch fits in pocket nicely
customer_reviews.text: Good small watch fits in pocket nicely but chain clip broke right away. I use it without the chain so OK
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Easy to read, Well built.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad because he breaks his or they get wet and get ruined. I'm hoping this one will hold up for him.
customer_reviews.author: kpin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The ring at the top of the watch is poorly designed and comes off of the watch. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Becky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautifully designed. It's quite easy to read and slim enough to fit comfortably in the watch pocket in my jeans. Don't use it but having the 24-hour option is a nice feature. Overall: an excellent timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wills

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size watch for me. We are not allowed to wear wrist watches on the job, but pocket watches are perfectly acceptable. The Gotham keeps perfect time. I am totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Gotham pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: At work we are not allowed to wear a wrist watch during working hours. I purchased the Gotham pocket watch, which is acceptable under our company guide lines. It not only looks great, but keeps perfect time. I have had many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: watch
customer_reviews.text: just love it big numbers fits great in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my father-in-law, not the best quality but still a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: G. Satici

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, easy to read and fits nice in watch pocket. Shipping was fast and watch came pre set with my time which was awsome. Keeps time very well and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon  Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my dad for Father's day and he loved it, and still loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Father's day and he loved it, and still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: ms.care714

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a work watch, looks good but the case is made of very thin metal and the lens is plastic rather than glass. Don't expect it to last very long. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Edward P Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very satisfactory. It is exactly as advertised and works fine. The seller's support when I had a problem due to my own error was EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: headache

customer_reviews.title: Keeps time as awatch should. I expect it to be worn daily
customer_reviews.text: Keeps time as a watch should. I expect it to be worn daily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and so far it is running great. He really likes it and uses it daily. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Holt

customer_reviews.title: I like the style and design
customer_reviews.text: I attached it to the upper corner of my bathroom mirror with Velcro as a clock. I like the style and design.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Timepieces Rule!
customer_reviews.text: Superb pocket watch, which I am so glad I found. 'Tis of highest quality and came at a great price. Will definitely buy Gotham, again, and recommend it to others. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gotham is right on time
customer_reviews.text: i had ordered a watch that was too large, bulky and heavy. isent it back and ordered the thin railroad model which better fit my size needs and it keeps excellent time.
customer_reviews.author: henry smith

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch for the price, gunmetal really makes the difference, bought as a gift, would purchase again for a gift
customer_reviews.author: dtt21555

customer_reviews.title: Splendid watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear face with large numbers easy to see in dim light. I carry it in my pocket with keys, change, a small pocket knife and so far I can detect no scratches on the very clear face. I have not checked the time displayed but without having reset it I find it in agreement with my home clocks -- close enough to exact time for my leisurely ways. Over all a very neat, efficient, clear and useable pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and thin which is just what I wanted. The chain that comes with the watch is also very nice, but I do not think that I will use it as just carry it in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: I like it just fine
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week, I like it just fine. Perfect in my denims.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O.

customer_reviews.title: it has been doing very well stuck in my pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: it has been doing very well stuck in my pocket with all the abuse that part part of the body gets, even with a lot of sweat
customer_reviews.author: lenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this Watch !
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight pocket watch. This watch is very thin and light weight. Keeps excellent time and is a great pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: David Bobb

customer_reviews.title: Good watch easy to read. dont have to open case to see time...Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Keeps good time,you can read 24hr of 12hr time at once.I use it on a small stand on my desk,and into my pocket and away I go..Tom from Florida
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Church

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: failed, 1 week. Maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good hand to it
customer_reviews.text: stopped keeping accurate time in just a few weeks. Replacement battery did not help. Looks nice, good hand to it, but it is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch at a great price. (Only been using it a couple of weeks. But I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smooth transaction and prompt delivery - the product is fantastic in look and manufacturing - thank you
customer_reviews.author: Zack Nammari

product_meta.title: Gotham Men's Gun Metal Ultra Thin Railroad Open Face Quartz Pocket Watch # GWC15026B
product_meta.description:
This highly polished gun metal finish open face ultra thin pocket watch is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a bright white dial with an easy to read railroad style dial with black numbers, detailed 24 hour inner track and antique style hands. The precision Japanese quartz movement never needs winding so you will always be on time. Also included is a 14 inch deluxe curb link chain with belt clip attachment. This beautiful pocket watch will arrive in an attractive velour burgundy gift pouch then boxed in gift packaging that does not need wrapping. As always, operating instructions and our hassle free lifetime limited warranty are enclosed. It's Gotham time..




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :5.2 x 4.9 x 1.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :GWC15026B
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 10, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Gotham
 * ASIN :B009OM28YG

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #846,018 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #364 inMen's Pocket Watches 
    *  #286587 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars92 ratings This highly polished gun metal finish open face ultra thin pocket watch is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a bright white dial with an easy to read railroad style dial with black numbers, detailed 24 hour inner track and antique style hands. The precision Japanese quartz movement never needs winding so you will always be on time. Also included is a 14 inch deluxe curb link chain with belt clip attachment. This beautiful pocket watch will arrive in an attractive velour burgundy gift pouch then boxed in gift packaging that does not need wrapping. As always, operating instructions and our hassle free lifetime limited warranty are enclosed. It's Gotham time..
feature_bullets: Classic open face gun metal finish pocket watch with ultra thin polished brass case suitable for engraving
Rich white railroad style dial with black 12 and red 24 hour markers
Includes 15 inch silver-tone curb link chain with belt clip holder attachment
Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card
